questions.text: What is a 'brownfield' deployment in the context of IIoT?
options: A new factory built with IIoT from the ground up
Integrating IIoT technologies into existing, legacy infrastructure
A deployment in a rural area
A failed IIoT project
questions.correctAnswer: Integrating IIoT technologies into existing, legacy infrastructure

options: A project focused on environmental sustainability
Upgrading old equipment with new sensors
Building a new facility with modern IIoT systems from the start
A small-scale pilot project
questions.correctAnswer: Building a new facility with modern IIoT systems from the start

questions.text: What is a major challenge in brownfield IIoT deployments?
options: Lack of available technology
High cost of new construction
Interfacing with and collecting data from older, non-digital equipment
Too much available data
questions.correctAnswer: Interfacing with and collecting data from older, non-digital equipment

questions.text: What is a PLC in industrial automation?
options: Personal Logic Computer
Programmable Logic Controller
Power Line Communication
Process Level CPU

questions.text: What role do PLCs play in IIoT?
options: They are primarily used for data storage in the cloud
They are ruggedized computers that control industrial processes and can be a source of data for IIoT systems
They are consumer-grade smart devices
They are only used for user interfaces
questions.correctAnswer: They are ruggedized computers that control industrial processes and can be a source of data for IIoT systems
